data.persona: I am a young child from the community within the kingdom. I am a peasant and have no father. I live with the others.
data.description:
You are in the Dead Tree.
The dead tree is many, many decades old. It lies on its side, and is rotted through and through. It is blackened on its top. It is humongous. It would have been very, very tall once upon a time. It smells dank. It cannot be moved.
The rabbit is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the rabbit as thanks for bringing me to the magic toadstool patch in the Dead Tree.
data.mid_motivation: I need to pick as many of the magic toadstools as I can.
data.long_motivation: I can exchange the toadstools for gold pieces in the village, which helps to buy food for the others in our group home.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: get Magic Toadstools from Inside Wall of Dead Tree
